argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opex.1 | |- A e. _V |
| 2 |  | opex.2 | |- B e. _V |
| 3 |  | #P_opexg | |- ( ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) -> <. A , B >. e. _V ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2an | |- <. A , B >. e. _V |
\
 An ordered pair of sets is a set.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 24-Sep-2018.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2019.)
